courseleaf.text:
Please note that the calendar below is subject to change. For the most up-to-date information, please see the official Academic Calendar, found on the Office of the Registrar's website .

Other important dates and deadlines can also be found on the Student Calendar .

Please also review Campus Guidelines andÂ Policies Concerning the Academic Calendar .

For further information regarding Reading/Review/Recitation week, please click here .

For Summer Sessions registration dates and deadlines, please see the Summer Sessions website .

Fall Semester 2014

TeleBears beginsMonday, April 7, 2014
Fee payment dueFriday, August 15, 2014
Fall semester beginsThursday, August 21, 2014
Welcome activities (Get Your Bearings)Saturday, August 23, 2014-Saturday, September 13, 2014
Instruction beginsThursday, August 28, 2014
Academic & Administrative holiday (Labor Day)Monday, September 1, 2014
HomecomingFriday, October 10, 2014-Sunday, October 12, 2014
Academic & Administrative holiday (Veterans Day)Tuesday, November 11, 2014
Academic & Administrative holiday (Thanksgiving)Thursday, November 27, 2014-Friday, November 28, 2014
Classes endFriday, December 5, 2014
Reading/Review/Recitation weekMonday, December 8, 2014-Friday, December 12, 2014
Last day of instructionFriday, December 12, 2014
Final examinationsMonday, December 15, 2014-Friday, December 19, 2014
Fall semester endsFriday, December 19, 2014
Academic & Administrative holidayWednesday, December 24, 2014-Thursday, December 25, 2014
Academic & Administrative holiday (New Year's)Wednesday, December 31, 2014-Thursday, January 1, 2014

Spring Semester 2015

TeleBears beginsMonday, October 20, 2014
Charter GalaTBD
Spring semester beginsTuesday, January 13, 2015
Fee payment dueThursday, January 15, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Martin Luther King, Jr. Day)Monday, January 19, 2015
Instruction beginsTuesday, January 20, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Presidents' Day)Monday, February 16, 2015
Spring recessMonday, March 23, 2015-Friday, March 27, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Cesar Chavez Day)Friday, March 27, 2015
Cal DaySaturday, April 18, 2015
Classes EndFriday, May 1, 2015
Reading/Review/Recitation weekMonday, May 4, 2015-Friday, May 8, 2015
Last day of instructionFriday, May , 2015
Final examinationsMonday, May 12, 2015-Friday, May 15, 2015
Spring semester endsFriday, May 15, 2015
CommencementSaturday, May 16, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Memorial Day)Monday, May 25, 2015

Summer Sessions 2015

TeleBears beginsMonday, February 2, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Memorial Day)Monday, May 25, 2015
First 6-week session beginsTuesday, May 26, 2015
10-week session beginsMonday, June 8, 2015
8-week session beginsMonday, June 22, 2015
First 6-week session endsThursday, July 2, 2015
Academic & Administrative holiday (Independence Day)Friday, July 3, 2015
Second 6-week session beginsMonday, July 6, 2015
3-week session beginsMonday, July 27, 2015
Second 6-week session endsFriday, August 14, 2015
10-week session endsFriday, August 14, 2015
8-week session endsFriday, August 15, 2015
3-week session endsFriday, August 14, 2015
